Service Name

This is the description of this service.

Search Companies

Search across all of the companies.

URL: https://ql1rvofpu5.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production/companies/

Authentication:

x-api-key:

Query Parameters:

search_name: The string to search company name by.
search_sic: The string to search SIC code by.
search_state: The string to search state of incorporation by.
Add Company

Add a new company to the database.

URL: https://ql1rvofpu5.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production/companies/

Authentication:

x-api-key:
Get Company

Get a single company record.

URL: https://ql1rvofpu5.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production/companies/{cik}/

Authentication:

x-api-key:

Path Parameters:

cik: The CIK for the company.
Update Company

Update the company record.

URL: https://ql1rvofpu5.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production/companies/{cik}/

Authentication:

x-api-key:

Path Parameters:

cik: The CIK for the company.
Delete Company

Delete a single company.

URL: https://ql1rvofpu5.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production/companies/{cik}/

Authentication:

x-api-key:

Path Parameters:

cik: The CIK for the company.
